specifications.Finish: Mechanical > Washer Washer is a post-treatment mainly applied to woven fabrics with a sturdy structure. Through washing processes, it induces slight shrinkage and creates natural creases and streaks, adding a vintage-like appearance and texture to the fabric. Chemical > PU Coated (front) PU coated refers to a thin layer of polyurethane applied to the fabricâ€™s front side. This coating provides water resistance, enhances durability, creates a smooth surface texture, and offers some resistance to stains and wind. Chemical > Water Repellent Water repellent finishing is a chemical treatment applied to the fabric surface to make water bead and roll off. This enhances resistance to light rain and splashes, helping garments stay drier and more comfortable without compromising breathability.
specifications.Care Advice: Chemical > PU Coated (front) There may be differences across batches of PU-coated fabrics due to variances in the color, thickness, and application of the coating. When storing the fabric, roll it up instead of folding it to prevent damage to the coated area. Chemical > Water Repellent Due to the nature of the chemical coating agents, chalk marks may appear on the surface of the fabric. Please handle it with care.
specifications.Care Instructions: Hand wash only Wash with similar colors Turn inside out before washing, Do not wring Do not bleach Line dry Do not iron Do not dry clean Recommended Use Activewear
